Create short, branded links in seconds with Nipsto.

Engage audience effortlessly. Shorten, customize, and share links to boost content performance with Nipsto's intuitive platform.

Shorten links with ease. Click the Nipsto button to instantly generate a concise, branded link for the current URL. Your new link is directly copied to your clipboard, ready to share in messages, posts, or emails.

Utilize branded links for better engagement. Personalize your links by editing the link fragment or using your custom domain to create professional, click-worthy links that stand out.

With Nipsto, turning long URLs into powerful connections is just a click away.
